questions.question: How does it work?
questions.answer: Message expense → AI categorizes → Get insights. That's it.

questions.question: Is it safe?
questions.answer: Yes. End-to-end encryption. No bank data stored.

questions.question: Family use?
questions.answer: Yes. Multiple users in Premium/Business plans.

questions.question: Bank integrations?
questions.answer: Manual entry now. Bank sync coming soon.
